titleStmt.title: Thomas Kerr v. William Cochrane. Order for Writ

bibl.title: Thomas Kerr v. William Cochrane. Order for Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: Territory of Washington, 6549 County of King,
In the district court holding terms at Seattle
In the matter of the application of Thomas Kerr
For a Writ of Habeas Corpus,

Upon reading and filing the petition of Thomas Kerr duly signed and verified by him whereby it appears that he is illegaly imprisoned and restrained of his liberty by William Cochrane Sheriff of said County of King at the County Jail in the said County of King in the Territory of Washington and stating wherein the alleged illegality consists from which it appears to me that a writ of Habeas Corpus ought to issue it is ordered that a writ of Habeas Corpus issue out of and under the seal of the district court of the County of King and Territory of Washington directed to the said William Cochrane Sheriff of said County commanding him to have the body of the said Thomas Kerr before me in the court room of the said court at the County of King on the 9th day of Feb 1889 at 4 o'clock P.M. of that day to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said petitioner Thomas Kerr together with the time and cause of his detention, and that you have then and there the said writ.
